# PKIssuerProvisioningExtensionStatus

**Class**

An object that indicates whether there are any payment cards available to add as Wallet passes.

## Declaration

```swift
class PKIssuerProvisioningExtensionStatus
```

## Creating an issuer extension provisioning status

- **init()**: Creates a new extension-handler status object.

## Reporting pass availability

- **passEntriesAvailable**: A Boolean value that indicates whether a payment card is available to add to an iPhone.
- **remotePassEntriesAvailable**: A Boolean value that indicates whether a payment card is available to add to an Apple Watch.

## Reporting requirements for authentication

- **requiresAuthentication**: A Boolean value that indicates whether adding a card requires an authorization-user-interface extension provided by your app.

## Returning extension status

- **status(completion:)**: Reports the status of your Wallet extension.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
